name: Project Frozenheart
description:
As a concept Project Frozenheart is a story-rich puzzle survival experience taking place 20 years after a flash freeze. You the player have never known the world as it was before nor what events led up to the apocalypse, perhaps you'll uncover and preserve long-lost truths...or maybe you'll die in the cold wastes like so many others...only time will tell...

In this demo: The Tech Demo made so far is designed to showcase player interactions and activities including objectives, item management, looting and using items. This also showcases a general environment style and rough character base mesh.
